# pkg-config .pc file generated by CMake 3.30.2 for libmongoc-1.27.3. DO NOT EDIT!
prefix=%INSTALL_PLACEHOLDER%
exec_prefix=${prefix}
libdir=${exec_prefix}/lib

Name: libmongoc
Description: The MongoDB C Database Driver library
Version: 1.27.3
Requires: libbson-static-1.0

Libs: -L${libdir} -lmongoc-static-1.0 -lDnsapi secur32.lib crypt32.lib Bcrypt.lib
Cflags:  -DMONGOC_STATIC -DBSON_STATIC -I${prefix}/include/libmongoc-1.0
